name: Everybody, Hearts!
description: 'Everybody, Hearts!' is a Nintendo Switchâ„¢ exclusive card game that is now available to download. Experience playing the AI via SINGLEPLAYER mode, have a maximum of 5 players in the online MULTIPLAYER mode, or enjoy LOCAL NETWORK PLAY, accomodating up to 4 players. OPTIONS allow changes to 8 game settings, including Card Passing, Breaking Hearts, or the elusive "Shooting The Moon".  Whether by yourself, with friends or online, you may now enjoy Hearts! to your hearts content!
intro: A Game of 'Everybody, Hearts!' can be played with 1-5 Players.
